scripts.build: npm run generate && esbuild --bundle ./src/server.ts --outdir=dist --minify --sourcemap --loader:.gql=text --platform=node && cd ./dist && zip -r ../function.zip .
scripts.package: npm run build && rm function.zip; cd ./dist && zip -r ../function.zip .
scripts.deploy: npm run package && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name inbo-vbp-biocache-index-management --zip-file fileb://function.zip
